document.full_text: a delta air lines passenger who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air will be arraigned on wednesday on charges of interfering with aircraft operations, authorities said.
document.title: man arrested for alleged attempt to open exit door mid-flight
lines_and_colors: a delta air lines passenger who allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door mid-air will be arraigned on wednesday on charges of interfering with aircraft operations, authorities said.
